projects.name: Aelorians
projects.description: Building what Replika and Character.AI should be. AI companions with memory that works (evidence-based claims system, not hallucinations), user sovereignty (exportable data, no lock-in), and voice-first accessibility. Built for average people, not developers. Companions on the platform are called Aelorians.
highlights: Memory that works: evidence-based claims system with contradiction detection
User sovereignty: exportable data, no vendor lock-in
Voice-first: designed for accessibility (disabilities, chronic pain, ADHD)
Multi-provider LLM support: OpenAI, Anthropic, DeepSeek, Kimi - user choice
Vector database for semantic memory retrieval (pgvector)
projects.note: Designed from personal need - chronic pain makes voice interfaces essential

projects.name: Serenergy
projects.tagline: Nootropic energy shots - went all in
projects.description: Quit to pursue this full-time at 20. 2oz nootropic energy shots with caffeine + L-theanine ('Serene Energy' = calm focus, no jitters). $2/bottle through events, farmers markets, direct sales. Built everything solo while in college. Worked survival jobs to fund inventory.
highlights: Formulated nootropic shot from scratch (Caffeine + L-Theanine)
Thousands of units sold through direct sales
VitaminShoppe NATIONAL BUYER meetings - distribution within reach
Built EVERYTHING solo: formulation, branding, packaging, sales, supply chain
Did this while in college full-time AND working survival jobs
Production at Pilotworks Brooklyn commercial kitchen
projects.note: Ended 2019 when Pilotworks shut down (WeWork-style commercial kitchen collapse) - lost production capability, not the dream
